meanings.definition: A form of vitamin B3 used in skincare products.
meanings.sent1: I bought a cream with niacinamides to help my skin.
meanings.sent2: Many skincare experts recommend using niacinamides for healthier skin.
meanings.sent3: The niacinamides in my lotion are like little helpers for my face.
meanings.sent4: Her glowing skin was like a canvas painted with niacinamides.
meanings.sent5: The power of niacinamides transformed her complexion.

meanings.definition: Niacinamide is a water-soluble vitamin that helps improve the appearance of enlarged pores, uneven skin tone, fine lines, and dullness.
meanings.sent1: I use niacinamides daily to address my skin concerns.
meanings.sent2: The benefits of niacinamides on skin are well-documented.
meanings.sent3: Niacinamides are like little magicians making my skin look better.
meanings.sent4: Her skin, under the influence of niacinamides, was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The effects of niacinamides on her complexion were truly remarkable.
